authors.author: Anthony J. Showalter Elisha A. Hoffman

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Leaning, leaning, newline Safe and secure from all alarms; newline Leaning, leaning, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What a fellowship, what a joy divine, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms! newline What a blessedness, what a peace is mine, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms! newline Oh how bright the path newline Grows from day to day, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: What have I to dread, what have I to fear, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms? newline I have blessed peace with my Lord so near, newline Leaning on the everlasting arms.
